Smolensk.title: Smolensk
Smolensk.byline: Smolensk (Russian: Смоленск) is a city in Central Russia.

Smolensk Oblast.title: Smolensk Oblast
Smolensk Oblast.byline: Smolensk Oblast is a region in Central Russia, which borders Bryansk Oblast to the southwest, Belarus to the west, Pskov Oblast to the northwest, Tver Oblast to the north, Moscow Oblast to the east, and Kaluga Oblast to the southeast.
